description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in component XYZ allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
An SQL injection vulnerability in module ABC could allow attackers to gain unauthorized access to the database.
Improper input validation in function DEF exposes users to potential XSS attacks.
A memory leak issue in the GHI component could lead to degraded system performance over time.
A privilege escalation vulnerability in kernel mode allows attackers to gain root access.
